name: autohide the menu & sidebar [Fox Business]
description:
Hides the Fox <s>News</s> Business header, footer, and sidebar. (But not permanently - hover at the edges of the screen to restore them.) Moves the superfluous photo to the end of the article, and moves the Print toolbox to the right. Now it resembles news again.

"<s>FoxNews</s> FoxBusiness: Almost news and fit to print"
